intro: Because the top won’t climb itself.
description:
Peaked Climbing drops you on a mysterious island with just one way out: climbing the massive mountain at its center. No guide, no shortcuts—just you, your wits, and a sheer cliff daring you to reach the top.

Scale four dangerous biomes, each packed with obstacles that’ll test your patience and skill. Miss a step, and you’ll pay for it with precious stamina or a painful fall. Hunt for anything that can help you survive—from suspicious snacks to strange gadgets—and patch yourself up when the mountain shows no mercy.

Keep climbing, plan carefully, and make the most of every quirky item you find. Each slip will cost you, but every determined step brings you closer to the peak.

Do you have what it takes to conquer the climb—or will the mountain send you tumbling like yesterday’s laundry? Grab your gear, and don’t look down!
